item.title: My (Running) Halls of Software Fame and Shame
item.description: TOC: What is this? The Hall of Fame The Hall of Shame What is this? Much as great literature, high art, or great music deserves praise, so does software. And I mean software in all of its forms - from robust bash scripts which hide in the internet’s shadows, to the expansive open-source projects known the world over, to weirdly helpful websites which refuse to run ads, and even to a select few high-gloss corporate products.
